@description.name: @description
@description.body: Methods to convert colors between different color spaces.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Regular expressions for color strings

@description.name: @description
@description.body: CSS3 system color names.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Named colors, only the 16 basic colors plus the following ones: transparent, grey, magenta, orange and brown

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the incoming value is a named color.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {String} the color value to test

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the color is a named color
@return.description: true if the color is a named color

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the color theme manager is loaded. Generally part of the GUI of qooxdoo.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true when color theme support is ready.
@return.description: true when color theme support is ready.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the incoming value is a themed color.

@param.body: value {String} the color value to test

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Try to convert an incoming string to an RGBA array. Supports themed, named and system colors, but also RGBA strings, hex[3468] values.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: str {String} any string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Array} returns an array of red, green, blue and optional alpha on a successful transformation
@return.description: returns an array of red, green, blue and optional alpha on a successful transformation

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the string could not be parsed
@throws.description: if the string could not be parsed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Try to convert an incoming string to an RGB array with optional alpha. Support named colors, RGB strings, RGBA strings, hex[3468] values.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: str {String} any string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Array} returns an array of red, green, blue on a successful transformation
@return.description: returns an array of red, green, blue on a successful transformation

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the string could not be parsed
@throws.description: if the string could not be parsed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Try to convert an incoming string to an RGB string, which can be used for all color properties. Supports themed, named and system colors, but also RGB strings, hexShort and hexLong values.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: str {String} any string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} a RGB string
@return.description: a RGB string

@throws.name: @throws
@throws.body: {Error} if the string could not be parsed
@throws.description: if the string could not be parsed

@param.body:
rgb {Array} an array with red, green and blue values and optionally
 an alpha value

an array with red, green and blue values and optionally
 an alpha value

@return.description: an RGB string

@return.description: a hex[68] string (#xxxxxx)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Tune a color string according to the tuneMap

@param.name: @param
@param.body: color {String} a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string
@param.description: a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scaleMap {Map}  as described above

@param.name: @param
@param.body: tuner {Function}  function

@param.name: @param
@param.body: hue_tuner {Function}  function

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} a valid CSS rgb color string.*
@return.description: a valid CSS rgb color string.*

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scale Scale the given properties of the input color according to the configuration given in the scaleMap. Each key argument must point to a number between -100% and 100% (inclusive). This indicates how far the corresponding property should be moved from its original position towards the maximum (if the argument is positive) or the minimum (if the argument is negative). This means that, for example, lightness: "50%" will make all colors 50% closer to maximum lightness without making them fully white. Supported keys are: red, green, blue, alpha, saturation, brightness, value, lightness.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: color {String}  a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string
@param.description: a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scaleMap {Map}  as described above

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} a valid CSS rgb color string.
@return.description: a valid CSS rgb color string.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adjust Increases or decreases one or more properties of the input color by fixed amounts according to the configuration given in the adjustMap. The value of the corresponding key is added to the original value and the final result is adjusted to stay within legal bounds. Hue values can go full circle.a1 Supported keys are: red, green, blue, alpha, hue, saturation, brightness, lightness

@param.name: @param
@param.body: color {String} a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string
@param.description: a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string

@param.name: @param
@param.body: scaleMap {Map} as described above

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} a valid CSS rgb color string.
@return.description: a valid CSS rgb color string.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: RgbToLuminance Calculate the luminance of the given rgb color.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: color {String} a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string
@param.description: a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Number} luminance
@return.description: luminance

@description.name: @description
@description.body: contrast Calculate the contrast of two given rgb colors.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: back {String} a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string
@param.description: a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string

@param.name: @param
@param.body: front {String} a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string
@param.description: a valid qooxdoo/CSS rgb color string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Number} contrast
@return.description: contrast

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Picks a contrasting color

@param.name: @param
@param.body: rgb {Number[]|String} the color, either as a string or as an RGB array of 3 numbers
@param.description: the color, either as a string or as an RGB array of 3 numbers

@param.name: @param
@param.body: threshold {Number?} the threshold between light and dark outputs, where the range is 0-255, defaults to 128
@param.description: the threshold between light and dark outputs, where the range is 0-255, defaults to 128

@param.name: @param
@param.body: dark {String?} the colour to use for "dark", defaults to black
@param.description: the colour to use for "dark", defaults to black

@param.name: @param
@param.body: light {String?} the colour to use for "light", defaults to white
@param.description: the colour to use for "light", defaults to white

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} colour string
@return.description: colour string
